summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for the Butterfly Trust from January 24 to January 31, 2014. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest payments, highlighting the financial activities associated with the trust during this period.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account statement.

locations: St. Thomas, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account balance for the Butterfly Trust as of January 31, 2014, was $8,043.87.
There was an incoming transfer of $58,043.65 on January 27, 2014.
The document outlines service charges totaling $50.00 for NSF return items during the statement period.
Interest earned during this period was $50.22.
The document includes instructions for disputing errors on the account statement.
